html.body:
Our hearing team is working to confirm your benefits and help coordinate your care by matching you with a local provider.

Keep an eye out in your inbox or mailbox for information about the provider so you can schedule your appointment.

We’ll let that provider know you’re coming and keep you informed about the process.

slot-configuration.description: Featured Products that display in the footer of the cart page, below the cart-actions buttons.
Sign in or Create an Account on Hearing Test Results page

html.body:
Ready to move forward?
Sign in or Create an account to view your coverage, pricing and select a provider.

Hearing health care designed for SEIU 775 Benefits Group members

If you've noticed a change in your hearing, you're not alone. Hearing loss is the third most common chronic condition among Americans, but it's also the most treatable. With EPIC Hearing Healthcare (EPIC), you'll get the options, care and convenience to help make it easier to hear the sounds you've been missing. Whether you're just beginning to notice a hearing loss or have been wearing hearing aids for years, EPIC can meet you where you are in your journey to better hearing.

Get started

slot-configuration.callout-msg: Take a look at one of these!

html.body: UnitedHealthcare Hearing, you have access to more than 7000+ URAC accredited* hearing professionals nationwide. Sign in to your member account or continue with our guest search to get started. When you choose a provider and request an appointment, you can complete a hearing test, talk with a hearing professional and get follow-up care and support.

Our hearing team is working to confirm your benefits and help coordinate your care by matching you with a local provider.

Keep an eye out in your inbox or mailbox for information about the provider so you can schedule your appointment.

We’ll let that provider know you’re coming and keep you informed about the process.

Create an account or Sign in to view benefit info and more.

slot-configuration.description: default slot for about us page

html.body:
About Commerce Cloud

It all started with a series of observations: eCommerce merchandising and marketing innovation is what generates the revenue, yet most operations are spending 80% of their budgets simply maintaining current infrastructure. The pace of ecommerce accelerates daily, yet most operations are scrambling to stand still. Merchandisers and marketers are supremely frustrated, spending more time chasing outsourced providers and internal IT organizations, than actually merchandising and marketing their own businesses. There had to be a better way.

Customer Service

Here you will find answers to your questions about shopping at our online store, your order, payment options and more. Simply select from the categories below for you complete information.

Affordable hearing aids and hearing care

Have you noticed a change in your hearing? With EPIC Hearing Healthcare (EPIC), you get the options, care and convenience to help make it easier to hear the sounds you've been missing.

Whether you're just beginning to notice a hearing loss or have been wearing hearing aids for years, EPIC can meet you where you are in your journey to better hearing.

To get started, take a quick online hearing test to check for hearing loss and find a care option that’s right for you.

Get started

Sign in for a personalized view of your hearing benefits and pricing.

Access your plan information

Check out your hearing coverage

Search for providers

Find a hearing care professional in your area.

Search products and view pricing

Discover hearing aids for your lifestyle and budget
Need Help? Call 1-855-523-9355, TTY 711

This is not a Horizon BCBSNJ product. EPIC Hearing Healthcare underwrites and has sole financial responsibility for the Hearing Benefit product. EPIC is an independent company that does not provide Blue Cross Blue Shield products or services. Horizon Blue Cross Blue Shield of New Jersey is an independent license of the Blue Cross and Blue Shield Association. The Blue Cross® and Blue Shield® names and symbols are registered marks of the Blue Cross and Blue Shield Association. The Horizon® name and symbols are registered marks of Horizon Blue Cross Blue Shield of New Jersey.

EPIC Hearing Healthcare supports Horizon Blue Cross Blue Shield of New Jersey in the administration of hearing plan benefits. EPIC Hearing Healthcare is independent from and not affiliated with the Horizon Blue Cross Blue Shield of New Jersey.

Underwritten by Fidelity Security Life Insurance Company, Kansas City, MO. administered by Forrest T. Jones & Company. Policy No. HC-118/HC-119.

Fully Insured Exclusions: No benefits will be paid for services or materials; Provided free of charge in the absence of insurance; payable under any Workers Compensation law or similar statutory authority; payable under any governmental plan or program whether Federal, State, or subdivisions thereof, except for medical assistance benefits under Title XIX of the Social Security Act (Medicaid); for the medical and/or surgical treatment of the internal or external structures of the ear(s); or provided by a Hearing Aid Dispenser; required by an employer as a condition of employment; or not prescribed by a Physician or Audiologist; for Hearing Aid batteries, cleaning supplies or accessories; or for ear protection devices or plugs; for Assistive Listening Devices; for replacement due to loss, theft or damage to the Hearing Aid. Termination of Coverage: The Insured's insurance will cease on the date the Policy ends; the end of the last period for which any required premium has been made; or the date the Insured is no longer eligible for insurance.

Here to help
Our hearing care providers can recommend a hearing device to fit your hearing needs. Call today for a personalized recommendation.
(866) XXX-XXXX

  • Hearing aid allowance: Plan pays up to $1,000 every 4 years.

html.body: FREE 2-Day SHIPPING FOR ORDERS OVER $300

slot-configuration.description: When the hearing test result is Good

html.body:
Your results
Your test results indicate that you have:
Good hearing
While you may not have hearing loss today, there are many stages of hearing loss and it may naturally decline as you get older. It's important to take steps to help minimize your degree of hearing loss, and it’s never too early to start talking about your hearing health.

slot-configuration.description: Care options when the hearing test result is Good

html.body:
My hearing care options
We recommend you scheduling an in-person appointment so you can talk to a hearing specialist and determine if hearing loss exists. With the help of a professional, you can explore solutions that may help enhance your hearing in noisy environments or improve the clarity of your conversations. Or, if you feel confident your hearing loss is minimal, consider an over-the-counter product and start shopping today.
In person care
 
If you want to learn more about hearing health, or think you may have hearing loss, the best place to start is with a hearing specialist.
 
Shop over-the-counter hearing products
 
Hearing aids aren’t just for people with hearing loss. Shop OTC products to help enhance the clarity of your conversations.
 
Learn more about hearing loss
In the U.S., hearing loss is on the rise. Although this health concern is more common among the aging population, there’s a growing prevalence at all ages. Even people in their 30s, 40s and 50s are experiencing hearing loss. Learn why treatment is important and a how a hearing aid could help by reading this short hearing loss article.
Read more about hearing loss >

slot-configuration.description: The slot displays on the bottom left of the home page.
Category links and images for the home page.
homepage product set(Spring Has Sprung) slot

html.body:
Find the care that fits

Your hearing health. Your way. Take a quick online hearing test, then explore our convenient care options to see which one is right for you.

Take the test

slot-configuration.description: Default banner for mens category landing page
Default slot to link to sub-categories under men's
When the hearing test result is Moderate

html.body:
Your results
Your test results indicate:
Mild to moderate hearing loss
With mild to moderate hearing loss, early treatment helps the brain maintain speech understanding, resulting in a better outcome. Many people with mild to moderate hearing loss have difficult hearing high-pitched consonant sounds (d, t, sh, s, f, th) compared to lower-pitched vowel sounds (o, a, ah, i, e). One of the simplest ways to take care of your hearing is by having a comprehensive hearing exam and routine follow-up care.

slot-configuration.description: Care options when the hearing test result is Moderate

html.body:
My hearing care options
We recommend you schedule an in-person or virtual appointment with one of our trusted providers.
Virtual care
 
Our convenient remote care program (Right2You) makes it possible to enjoy real-time hearing aid adjustments and support right from the comfort of home.
 
In person care
 
If you prefer a more traditional in person setting, enjoy hearing aid support at a network location in your area.
 
Learn more about hearing tests
Learn what to expect for your hearing test. Plus, find out how to prepare and how often you should get tested. Once your hearing test is complete, you’ll have the chance to review the results with a hearing professional.
Read more about hearing loss >

slot-configuration.description: Default slot to link to sub-categories under new arrivals
When the hearing test result is Severe Hearing Loss

html.body:
Your results
Your test results indicate:
Severe hearing loss
Severe hearing loss can lead to many life challenges, impacting your physical, emotional and overall well-being. It’s important to take good care of your hearing. One of the simplest ways to do that is by having a comprehensive hearing exam and routine follow-up care.

slot-configuration.description: Care options when the hearing test result is Severe Hearing Loss

html.body:
My care options
We recommend you schedule an in-person appointment with one of our trusted providers.
In person care
 
Visit a network hearing provider at a location near you for hearing aid care and support.
 
Learn more about hearing tests
Check out this short article on hearing tests and learn what to expect. It will help you prepare and also shows you how often you should get tested. Once your hearing test is complete, you’ll have the chance to review the results with a hearing professional.
Read more about hearing loss >

Don’t have a recent hearing test?

No problem. Schedule an appointment now with a hearing provider near you.

Upload hearing test
